definition: Zen saying repeated as cant/(fig.) catchphrase/mantra/favorite expression/stock phrase
honorific title for a Buddhist monk
Panchen (Lama)/abbr. for 班禪額爾德尼|班禅额尔德尼[Ban1 chan2 E2 er3 de2 ni2]
see 禪城區|禅城区[Chan2 cheng2 qu1]
a room in a Buddhist monastery/a temple
to practice Chan Buddhist meditation/to practice Zen meditation/to sit in meditation
the staff of a Buddhist monk

sentences.english: This fungus victimizes a particular type of cicada found in East Asia, using it as a host in which to propagate.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲，這種菌通過一種特殊的禪作爲宿主繁殖。

sentences.english: Always remember to adopt Zen "beginner's mind."
sentences.chinese: 永遠記住去採取禪裏的“初心”。

sentences.english: Today I will teach a new meditation, make you even better person.
sentences.chinese: 今天我要教你一種新的禪修法，使你成爲更好的人。

sentences.english: His articles are strongly flavored of Zen.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章題詠，也經常禪味十足。

sentences.english: While the master quietly served tea, the professor talked about Zen.
sentences.chinese: 當禪師安靜地準備茶水時，學者滔滔不絕地談着禪。

sentences.english: Meditating under the Say?daw's guidance, I applied the Satipatthana method.
sentences.chinese: 在明昆長老的指導下，我開始運用四念處禪修法。

sentences.english: Except for Zen Habits. That’s the only blog you’re allowed to read when you decompress.
sentences.chinese: 禪那網除外，當你減壓時只允許讀這個博客。

sentences.english: Whether to explain the case and the control group come the imperial sacrifices?
sentences.chinese: 是否講清了病例和對照組的來禪？

sentences.english: How can I remove a zen-grid-item mixin declared in a previous media query?
sentences.chinese: 如何刪除禪的網格項目混入一個媒體查詢申報的嗎？

sentences.english: Beings in these planes enjoy varying degrees of jhanic bliss.
sentences.chinese: 此域諸天享受着程度不一的禪那之喜。

sentences.english: Wenzichan-Zen is an special concept and has special denotative.
sentences.chinese: “文字禪”是一個特殊的概念，具有特定的內涵。

sentences.english: Grandpa enjoyed reading and contemplating on his life.
Do you think there is a relationship between minimalism and Zen?
sentences.chinese: 你是否認爲極簡主義和禪之間有着密切的關係？

sentences.english: If you understand Zen, you will not be afraid to die.
sentences.chinese: 如果你懂得了禪，你就不怕死。

sentences.english: All such dharmas result in fruition. This is Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 所有的這類禪獲得果位。

sentences.english: Great productivity-ists subscribe to Zen Habits.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的企業生產者訂閱禪習慣。

definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
honorific title for a Buddhist monk
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to practice Chan Buddhist meditation/to practice Zen meditation/to sit in meditation
